data.name: Industries of Titan OST
data.detailed_description:
Industries Of Titan Under Construction OST


Hey Founder, we just got this audio transmission — It's Danny Baranowsky's album that he'll update throughout development. He's included MP3 and FLAC, but with the download speeds on the spaceport? Yeah, I can't get you all the formats straight away.

The readme.txt said he'll send the release version of the tracks once they're finished to anyone who downloads this. Pretty neat, huh?
I already gave them a listen — I think you're gonna love them!

Urlan Fletch, Spaceport Operator

data.short_description: Official Industries of Titan work-in-progress soundtrack from composer Danny Baranowsky featuring DRM-free tracks updated throughout development.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 142 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 600 MB available space
